# Format: ii  package-name  version  architecture  description

ii  curl  7.68.0-1ubuntu1.13  amd64  command line tool for transferring data with URLs
ii  git  1:2.25.1-1ubuntu3.5  amd64  fast, scalable, distributed revision control system
ii  python3  3.8.10-0ubuntu1  amd64  interactive high-level object-oriented language (default python3 version)
ii  openssl  1.1.1f-1ubuntu2.16  amd64  Secure Socket Layer and cryptography libraries and tools
ii  openssh-client  1:8.2p1-4ubuntu0.5  amd64  secure shell (SSH) client, for secure access to remote machines
